content: {"id": "4799", "name": "Easthampton Community Center Emergency Pantry", "address": "12 Clark Street", "address2": "", "city": "Easthampton", "state": "MA", "zip": "01027", "phone": "(413) 527-5240", "latitude": 42.263954, "longitude": -72.66238, "hours": null, "url": "https://easthamptoncommunitycenter.org/", "description": "Pantry is open Monday and Wednesday from 9:00 a.m. \u2013 12:00 p.m. and 4:00 \u2013 7:00 p.m. Distribution is outdoors, with pantry bags distributed weekly and perishables distributed daily.
